title: New: Tora – These Eyes
content:
Australia yet again.

Tora are no strangers to the pages of CitR, having reared their heads in September of last year, they’ve consistently been putting out top quality material. New track These Eyes dropped shortly before SXSW craziness kicked in, so we’re just catching up now, and they just keep getting better. Vocally, it’s stronger than anything they’ve released in the past, and is hopefully a sign of an album on the horizon. Stream These Eyes below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
